note:
Equitable degrowth of food consumption for the health of life on Earth 🌎
PhD. 2nd PhD candidate at The Australian National University

✍️ Topics:
#environment #climate #biodiversity #PlanetaryBoundaries #SustainableDiets #extinction #FoodSystems #health #degrowth #equity #rewilding

✊ Actions:
#vegan #NativePlanting #veganic #homegrown #research #EnvironmentalCommunication

⚠️ Warning!
#Autism = faux pas!

🦘 #GubbiGubbi Country / #SunshineCoast #QLD #Australia

🔁 or ⭐ ≢ agree

A second start on Mastodon because I had to migrate. My interests are: #climate, #nuclear, #writing, #AI, #mindfulness. I figure if we are not mindful of all that is happening, we can't get from where we are to where we need to be.

Born and raised on an Illinois farm on Rt. 66, detoured to teach at University of Oregon and write books. Now realize how I was raised is pretty much where we need to be to have a sustainable Earth for all of us moving forward.
